name: India
interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: United States
interestingFact: The United States has no official language.

name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan is home to the world's oldest company, Kongo Gumi, founded in 578 AD.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.

name: China
